name: Basic Plan
description: Perfect for beginners who want to stay active.
features: Access to gym during staffed hours

name: Standard Plan
description: Ideal for regular gym-goers looking to step it up.
features: Access to all group fitness classes (yoga, Zumba, HIIT)

name: Premium Plan
description: For those who want the full fitness experience.
features: Access to Premium Lounge & Smoothie Bar
